mapper.select: select id, username, password, name, age from user;
mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, name, age) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age});
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, age = #{age} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from user where username = #{username} and password = #{password};
